name: Hours of Design
description:
Hour of design is a platform level I designed following the tutorial series "Hour of Code" from the unreal engine.  

All the content is made by unreal and can be downloaded for the unreal engine 4 here. 

The background music is free, and here you find the credits:
Inner Light by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3916-inner-light
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

If you want to know more about the design process, you can find it here.

Buttons If you play with the keyboard, you can find the tutorial in-game.

___________________________________
If you play with a controller XBOX:
Space bar = A
WASD = Left-Stick
L-Shift = R1
E = X
ESC = it lets you exit the game at any moment. You will lose all your progress.
___________________________________

Play Time: 20-minute maximum if you take your time to explore everything and play it in chilling.

Did you play the level?
If you played the level, leave a screenshot in the comments with your results and let me know if you liked it!
